contents:
目前来看，我觉得 ProtonMail（免费/付费）和 KolabNow（付费）比较好

至于 Tutanota ，暂且存疑
见 粉碎棱镜 项目推荐的 Privacy-Conscious Email Services
Notes
Be wary of services with servers hosted in:

  • the United States (yes, even Riseup)

  • Canada

  • Germany


[li]Tutanota has been removed from this list because of this blog post (cached)[/li]

理由是Tutanota官方博客于2017年2月发布的一篇：
After Recent Scandal Trump Family Turns Towards Encrypted Tutanota Emails

对此，Tutanota后来致歉说
**Fake news alert: This post is of course not true and was meant as a joke.

We apologize for any misunderstanding and will refrain from parody in the future.**

但截止至2019.1，前述名单里并没有恢复Tutanota

此外，Tutanota应该是有注册限制的（废话，防止滥用）
我曾经挂不同的代理注册了十万甚至九万个Tutanota帐号，注册成功后出现
Sorry, you are currently not allowed to send or receive emails because your account was marked for approval. This process is necessary to offer a privacy-friendly registration and prevent mass registrations at the same time. Your account will be automatically approved after 48 hours. Thank you for your patience!

后来帐号就被全部削除，无法登录，Recovery Code也失效，而再次注册相同username时显示
Email address is not available.

ProtonMail我也注册了很多个，但是没有出现过Tutanota的问题:)

所以我暂且胡乱推荐 ProtonMail
https://protonmail.com/
